text: Where on Slack would be the right place to ask questions about `Blink.jl` ? I’m trying to use it on an ARM64, but it doesn’t work. I suspect it’s because it downloads the x64 version of Electron (and I have no clue if an ARM version even exists…)

elements.text: Where on Slack would be the right place to ask questions about
? I’m trying to use it on an ARM64, but it doesn’t work. I suspect it’s because it downloads the x64 version of Electron (and I have no clue if an ARM version even exists…)

text: New versions of Electron have ARM64 support (see <https://github.com/electron/electron/releases/tag/v11.2.2>)

elements.text: New versions of Electron have ARM64 support (see

text: So if you fix the arch check and adjust the version in <https://github.com/JuliaGizmos/Blink.jl/blob/master/src/AtomShell/install.jl> you should be able to use Blink fine (at least if the APIs haven't changed too much)
